attributes.action: Review the Human Rights entitled to criminals, compared to those entitled to law-abiding citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The severity of the crime should be indirectly proportional to the criminals' entitlements to human rights. Ultimately a criminal's human rights should not be the same as law-abiding citizens, and they should be waived if it benefits justice/civillians/victims
